xxl.core.indexStructures.rtrees

Class AbstractIterativeRtreeBulkloader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.indexStructures.rtrees.AbstractIterativeRtreeBulkloader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IterativeBulkLoaderInterface<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RtreeIterativeBulkloader, STRBulkLoader, TGSBulkLoader

    public abstract class AbstractIterativeRtreeBulkloader<T>
extends Object
implements IterativeBulkLoaderInterface<T>
    This class provides basic functionality for level-by-level loading of R-trees. First the leaf level is build; Produced index entries are stored in auxiliary data structure, this could be file, list or container;

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AbstractIterativeRtreeBulkloader.ProcessingType

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected GenericPartitioner.CostFunctionArrayProcessor<? extends Rectangle> arrayProcessor
      this is used for optimal partitioning computation
      protected int b_Index
      minimal number of elements per index node computed from block size, dimension and double point rectangle is a descriptor additionally long is stored for node address
      protected int B_Index
      number of elements per index node computed from block size, dimension and double point rectangle is a descriptor additionally long is stored for node address
      protected int b_Leaf
      minimal number of elements per leaf node computed from block size and data size
      protected int B_Leaf
      number of elements per leaf node computed from block size and data size
      protected int blockSize
      Block size in bytes; Used for computation of the minimal and maximal number of object per node
      protected Converter<T> dataConverter
      Data converter, used to serialize objects in leaf nodes
      protected int dataSize
      Data size in bytes
      protected int dimension
      number of dimensions
      protected int level
      internal state
      protected Converter<MapEntry<Long,DoublePointRectangle>> mapEntryConverter
      intern representation of index entries computed in one iteration step; First value stores nodes address, second value stores doublePointRectangle (descriptor of the computed node)
      protected int numberOfDataObjects
      optional value for the overall number of objects to load
      protected int partitionSize 
      protected AbstractIterativeRtreeBulkloader.ProcessingType pType
      partitioning types
      protected double ratio
      Is used to compute the minimal number of objects per node;
      protected RTree rtree
      R-tree to bulk load; R-tree is initialized and ready to use after bulk loading is finished.
      protected double storageUtil
      avg. storage utilization per node e.g. value 0.5 repersents avg space utilization of 50% per node.
      protected Container treeContainer
      target container of the Rtree
